The presence of a Coca: Cola logo in a screenshot taken from LinkedIn does not prove that the video course featuring DiAngelo was required viewing for Coca-Cola employees.
Coca: Cola has explicitly denied that the course, which included a section entitled "Try to be less white," was part of the curriculum for its mandatory diversity, equity, and inclusion training.
The evidence presented by Karlyn Borysen: Cola included the presentation in its required diversity training for employees.
